name: Dance, Death and Robots
description:
Synopsis :

In 2050, you are now the last human on earth. The apocalypse happened. Robots took over. Climate change caused a series of cataclysm: sandstorms, nuclear explosions and rising lava.

 

Technical challenge : adaptive environment

Some cataclysms modify the map permanently: nuclear explosions create big craters in the landscape and the lava slowly covers the lower regions of the maps.

 

Controls:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Jump: SpaceBar
  • Reload: R
  • Sprint: Left Shift
  • Shoot: Left Mouse
